content: घटनं, --ना [घट्-ल्युट्] {@--1@} Effort, exertion. {@--2@} Happening, occurring {@--3@} Accomplishment, bringing about, effecting; as in अघाटेतघटना. {@--4@} Joining, union, mixing or bringing together, combination; तप्तेन तप्तमयसा घटनाय योग्यं <ls>V. 2. 16</ls>; देहद्वयार्धघटनारचितं <ls>K. 239</ls>: <ls>U. 3. 13.</ls> {@--5@} Making, forming, shaping. {@--6@} Motion. {@--7@} Strife, hostility; <ls>Pt. 1. 159.</ls> {@--8@} (ना) A troop of elephants.
